frontmatter.title: EvaStore
frontmatter.meta_title: EvaStore - Shopify mobile store by React Native and GraphQL
frontmatter.meta_description: EvaStore and its massive source of various styles, look & feel navigations, mobile templates, convert your Online shops from Shopify website to mobile apps.

markdownRemark.html:
EvaStore and its massive source of various styles, look & feel navigations, mobile templates, convert your Online shops from Shopify website to mobile apps.

The omnichannel sale is the must-go trend to increase profits and reach sale target. Your customers not only shop offline or on website desktop but also the mobile app. A Mobile application allows your store to push notifications, learn customer shopping behavior, provide the right products at the right times, and sale more. With EvaStore and the massive source of various styles, look & feel navigations, mobile templates, you can convert your Online shop from Shopify website to mobile apps in just some moments. See how- below!

What will you get?

  • Easy to connect with your Shopify store in few step.
  • Fully integrated with all feature of the Shopify store, please check out below features screenshot.
  • Build your standalone app and delivery to both Appstore & Google Play
  • Run with Expo tools (http://expo.io) which is easy to setup
  • Run smoothly and already well testing on both of iOS & Android from the QA team.
  • Free further version update and coming new features.
  • Awesome support from the technical team and great community https://github.com/inspireui/support/issues
  • High coding quality from the Elite Author of Envato (https://codecanyon.net/user/inspireui)
  • 100% refund if you are not happy with the products.

Reference

  • iOS demo: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/evastore/id1434287263
  • Android demo: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.inspireui.evastore
  • Company website: https://inspireui.com/product/evastore
